abstract.t: This document augments the ietf-yang-library to provide the augmented-by list. It facilitates the process of obtaining the entire dependencies between YANG modules, by directly querying the server's YANG module. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/Zephyre777/draft-lincla-netconf-yang-library- augmentation.
